uan.legend: Which claim do you want to continue?

person-named.label: The person named on the duty to remove notice

has-legal-representative.label: An immigration advisor representing the claimant
has-legal-representative.hint: Such as a solicitor or legal representative. You must have already sent a letter of authority to the Home Office to confirm that you can represent the person named on the duty to remove letter.

someone-else.label: Someone helping the person named on the duty to remove notice
someone-else.hint: You cannot give immigration advice. You must answer all the questions as if you are the person named on the duty to remove letter.

in-the-uk.legend: Are you currently in the UK?

phone-number.legend: Do you have a phone number?

phone-number-details.label: Enter your phone number
phone-number-details.hint: For international numbers, please include country code

email-address.legend: Do you have an email address?
email-address.hint: We will use this to send you a copy of this form.

has-address.legend: Are you currently in immigration detention?

has-permission-access.legend: Do you give us permission to access your Immigration Removal Centre medical records?

your-address.label: Enter your address
your-address.hint: This must be where you live.

legal-representative-phone-number.label: Phone number
legal-representative-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code.

someone-else-relationship.label: What is your relationship to the person on the duty to remove notice?

someone-else-organisation.label: Oragnisation name (otional)
someone-else-organisation.hint: For example, charity or law firm name

life-threatened-detail.label: Enter details of how you came to the UK
